Title: 200 - Boids and Simulation
Tip: Use the Boids simulation as a stress test.

Summary.What: Boids is a simulation of flocking birds that show the impact of large numbers of shapes on performance.
Summary.Why: Model / shape seperation is important for future integrations but can degrade performance. So ongoing performance testing is important.
Summary.How: All boids must recalculate their position and velocity every frame, which is very demanding.

Samples.Tip: The Boids simulation is an excellent stress test.
